2024-03-01.text: Not yet. The client was acting strange though.
He kept asking if I told anyone about the case.

2024-03-02.text: I checked the office. Your files are missing.
That’s impossible. They were locked in the safe.
Damn… that means it was an inside job.

2024-03-03.text: Got a name for you. Elias Mercer.
That’s the guy? Who hired you?
Yes. But he disappeared last night.
